title: Best Places to Wait Between Orders in Phoenix (Local Driver Guide) | Ashmaig Auto Rentals
description: A practical Phoenix-area staging guide for Uber Eats, DoorDash, Instacart, Amazon Flex, and rideshare drivers. Find the best places to wait between orders near Downtown Phoenix, Tempe/ASU, Old Town Scottsdale, Westgate/Glendale, Sky Harbor, and more.
